title: 'Absolutely Substandard pillow'
body: This is not how it's advertised. It's absolutely Substandard and on the first use felt like using a normal pillow. When I lie down with my head and neck on it, it compresses fully and makes me feel there is no pillow at all. Because of that, there is strain in my neck.  Please avoid.

title: 'Fantastic Pillowcase'
body: I'm extremely satisfied with this pillowcase. This pillowcase is fantastic – it's super soft, fits my pillow perfectly, and the fact that it's removable, washable, and has a zipper is a huge plus for easy maintenance. The grey color looks classy too. I'm really happy with this product and would definitely recommend it for a great night's sleep.
